# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for filters

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.filters }}</div>

## Signature

```> length {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input     | output |
| --------- | ------ |
| list\<any\> | int    |
| table     | int    |
## Examples

Count the number of items in a list
```nu
> [1 2 3 4 5] | length
5
```

Count the number of rows in a table
```nu
> [{a:1 b:2}, {a:2 b:3}] | length
2
```
